title: Hero Blessed by the Demon King, the Largest Human Traitor!? - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Ecchi   Fantasy   Harem   Psychological   Romance   Supernatural
tags: Adapted to Manga   Antihero Protagonist   Cunning Protagonist   Curious Protagonist   Cute Children   Demon Lord   Demons   Elves   Enemies Become Allies   Heroes   Hiding True Identity   Loli   Male Protagonist   Money Grubber   Polygamy   Proactive Protagonist   Religions   Sharp-tongued Characters   Summoned Hero   Transported to Another World
author: Sasaki Sakuma   笹木さくま
description:
'Somewhat being a hero!' Shinichi Toyama was suddenly summoned to a sword and magic world by the blue demon king.

The demon king has a cute daughter who loves delicious food and just came for that to the human world without any intention to harm humanity.

However he is troubled by the resurrected heroes who attack her every day to kill him.

Shinichi who came to a different world with great pains embarks on the mission to repel the heroes with the scheme to become a strong devil!!>
